title: Welcome To Recipe Community
text: Roman recipes are known starting in the 2nd century BCE with Cato the Elder's De Agri Cultura. Many authors of this period described eastern Mediterranean cooking in Greek and in Latin.[4] Some Punic recipes are known in Greek and Latin translation.
